name: Ember's Climb
description:
Ludum Dare 49 Entry

Standard movement keys used (WASD / Up-Down-Left-Right)

Press space to jump, hold space to jump longer. Platforms won’t last forever so move quickly!

Collect diamonds to increase score - survive for as long as you can before the lava catches up!

Credit for sound assets

https://opengameart.org/content/lava-splash

https://opengameart.org/content/lava-loop
